New Links Page

Mar 9, 2002

I’ve finally gotten around to adding a Links page to my site. It’s got links to some of my favorite sites, as well as sites that belong (or are otherwise connected) to friends of mine. I hope some of the links will be enjoyable to those of you who can find nothing better to do with your time than mindlessly surf the web!
